title: Readout of Vice President Biden’s Call with President Petro Poroshenko of Ukraine | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Vice President


For Immediate Release
October 12, 2016

 



Readout of Vice President Biden’s Call with President Petro Poroshenko of Ukraine





	Vice President Biden spoke to President Petro Poroshenko of Ukraine today.  The leaders condemned ceasefire violations by combined Russian-separatist forces and discussed their shared understanding of a phased path towards full implementation of the Minsk agreements, including completing disengagement in the three agreed-upon sites.  The Vice President stressed the critical importance of continuing Ukraine's economic and anti-corruption reforms and ensuring their transparent implementation.
